s.text: Will happens to have the Bible with him at the ABC sound stage , and intends to read the scriptural passage in question!
Brill himself appeared on several of the shows to discuss Point 4. Clintonians, led by Rahm Emanuel ( Meet the Press ), made appearances to call for an investigation.

Opinions you can carry in your pocket: Add "saves need to follow news" to the list of reasons why one should watch Meet the Press . Host Tim Russert to Woodward: "Where are we in this story [presidential scandal]?
In the absence of legitimate campaign issues, he predicts, this could become a relative biggie.
